description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
Mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) maximizes individual payoff
Choosing option 2 unilaterally may lead to a higher payoff for one player but risks zero payoff for the other
Mutual defection (both choosing option 2) results in lower payoffs for both
The game resembles a variant of the Prisoner's Dilemma, where cooperation is optimal but defection can be tempting for short-term gains.
